pullrequest.title: Fixed a typo in logging failures in the queue.

content.raw:
I didn't even click abort, I think that one of the devices crashed on transition to buffered, which automatically triggered an abort?
I think I've had BLACS hang when things go wrong on transition to buffered before, but never looked into it. Was pretty obvious when looking at the log files though!
